CHANNEL_ID.description: ID channel database di telegram (wajib channel privat)

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: ID channel forcesub,jika tidak pakai forcesub isi dengan 0

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: Pesan start di bot,bisa pakai format HTML

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Optional: Pesan forcesub di bot,bisa pakai format HTML

ADMINS.description: ID admin yg dapat membuat link

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: Protect content agar bot tidak bisa di screenshot & diteruskan
